section.p: This template represents any act that cannot be classified as an observation or procedure according to the HL7 RIM. Examples of these acts are a dressing change, teaching or feeding a patient, or providing comfort measures. The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g., splenectomy).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-8291, CONF:1098-10519, CONF:1098-32505 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-8290)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-8298), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureAct statusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32364)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-8299)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8322, CONF:1098-8323, CONF:1098-31396)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8326, CONF:1098-8327, CONF:1098-15601)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8329, CONF:1098-8330, CONF:1098-15602)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-8301)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-8302)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8303, R2.0=CONF:1098-8303)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8304, R2.0=CONF:1098-8304)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-8305)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:1098-8306)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8307, R2.0=CONF:1098-8307)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8308, R2.0=CONF:1098-8308)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-8310)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-8309)

SHOULD contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32477)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
entryRelationship with target class Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" true (CONF:1098-8324)
@code MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) or CDT-2 (Code System: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.13) (CONF:1098-19190)
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8289, R2.0=CONF:1098-8289)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-8290)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8292, R2.0=CONF:1098-8292)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8293, R2.0=CONF:1098-8293)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-8298), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureAct statusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32364)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-8299)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:8300, R2.0=CONF:1098-8300)

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:8311, CONF:15599, R2.0=CONF:1098-8311, R2.0=CONF:1098-15599)
Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8314, R2.0=CONF:1098-8314)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316, R2.0=CONF:1098-8316)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:8315, R2.0=CONF:1098-8315)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter such that it (CONF:8317, R2.0=CONF:1098-8317)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8318, R2.0=CONF:1098-8318)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8319, R2.0=CONF:1098-8319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8320, R2.0=CONF:1098-8320)
MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16849, R2.0=CONF:1098-16849)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8322, CONF:1098-8323, CONF:1098-31396)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8326, CONF:1098-8327, CONF:1098-15601)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8329, CONF:1098-8330, CONF:1098-15602)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-8301)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-8302)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8303, R2.0=CONF:1098-8303)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8304, R2.0=CONF:1098-8304)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-8305)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:1098-8306)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8307, R2.0=CONF:1098-8307)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8308, R2.0=CONF:1098-8308)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-8310)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-8309)

SHOULD contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32477)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:15596, R2.0=CONF:1098-19186)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15596, R2.0=CONF:1098-19187)
reference, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15597, R2.0=CONF:1098-19188)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15598, R2.0=CONF:1098-19189)
@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:19190, R2.0=CONF:1098-19190)

participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8312, R2.0=CONF:1098-8312)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" true (CONF:8316, R2.0=CONF:1098-8316)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8324)
entryRelationship with target class Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" true (CONF:1098-8324)
@code MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) or CDT-2 (Code System: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.13) (CONF:1098-19190)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10519 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12"
Consol Procedure Activity Act code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:15596, R2.0=CONF:1098-19186)
Consol Procedure Activity Act originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15596, R2.0=CONF:1098-19187)
Consol Procedure Activity Act reference, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15597, R2.0=CONF:1098-19188)

Consol Procedure Activity Act reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15598, R2.0=CONF:1098-19189)
Consol Procedure Activity Act @code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:19190, R2.0=CONF:1098-19190)

Consol Procedure Activity Act participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8312, R2.0=CONF:1098-8312)
Consol Procedure Activity Act entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" true (CONF:8316, R2.0=CONF:1098-8316)
Consol Procedure Activity Act entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8324)
SHALL conform to CDA Act
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8289, R2.0=CONF:1098-8289)
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:8290)
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8292, R2.0=CONF:1098-8292)
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8293, R2.0=CONF:1098-8293)
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:8298)
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8299)
Consol Procedure Activity Act MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:8300, R2.0=CONF:1098-8300)
Consol Procedure Activity Act SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Procedure Act Performer (CONF:8301)

Consol Procedure Activity Act MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:8311, CONF:15599, R2.0=CONF:1098-8311, R2.0=CONF:1098-15599) Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

Consol Procedure Activity Act MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8322, CONF:8323, CONF:15600) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

Consol Procedure Activity Act MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8326, CONF:8327, CONF:15601) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

Consol Procedure Activity Act MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8329, CONF:8330, CONF:15602) Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP, and Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
Consol Procedure Activity Act MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, where its type is Entry Relationship (CONF:8314, R2.0=CONF:1098-8314)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Performer2
Consol Procedure Act Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Procedure Act Assigned Entity (CONF:8302)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Procedure Act Assigned Entity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8303, R2.0=CONF:1098-8303)
Consol Procedure Act Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8304, R2.0=CONF:1098-8304)
Consol Procedure Act Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8305)
Consol Procedure Act Assigned Entity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization, where its type is Procedure Act Represented Organization (CONF:8306)
SHALL conform to CDA Organization
Consol Procedure Act Represented Organization SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8307, R2.0=CONF:1098-8307)
Consol Procedure Act Represented Organization MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8308, R2.0=CONF:1098-8308)
Consol Procedure Act Represented Organization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8310)
Consol Procedure Act Represented Organization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8309)
SHALL conform to CDA Entry Relationship
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316, R2.0=CONF:1098-8316)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:8315, R2.0=CONF:1098-8315)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter, where its type is Procedure Act Encounter (CONF:8317, R2.0=CONF:1098-8317)
Consol Procedure Act Encounter MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16849, R2.0=CONF:1098-16849)
SHALL conform to CDA Encounter
Consol Procedure Act Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8318, R2.0=CONF:1098-8318)
Consol Procedure Act Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8319, R2.0=CONF:1098-8319)
Consol Procedure Act Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8320, R2.0=CONF:1098-8320)
